column1: UG is a Primitive Quendian Sundocarme signifying "dislike".
column2: p. 24 Patrick H. Wynne has suggested that the root is "probably related" to UK.
column4: "Editors Notes") Appearing in a late manuscript concerned with negation
column8: p. 33 it has been suggested that the root could be related to the early negative stem UGU (yielding the Quenya derivative ūmea "evil").
